name: register_child
description: A tool used for registering MR volumes with a child's atlas in Freesurfer.

inputs.description: Input MR volume to be used for registration.
inputs.name: Input Volume

inputs.description: Directory where output files will be written.
inputs.name: Output Directory

output-files.description: File where transformed control points are written.
output-files.name: Transformed Control Points

output-files.description: File where intensity normalized volume is written.
output-files.name: Intensity Normalized Volume

author: FreeSurfer Developers
